website_summaries.verdict: A great, affordable option for a quick re-do on a bedroom.
pros: Has 10 pieces in the complete bedding bag
Set includes decorative pillows and covers
Set comes in several color options with a basic but stylish design
cons: Set does not include a bed skirt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: turns out having sheets and a comforter really impresses the ladies
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 16 year old because her previous set was getting old and was very concerned after reading reviews. I am pleasantly surprised with how soft it is and quality looks good. Didn’t want to spend too much money as she is a teenager and they don’t tend to keep things in the best condition. Matches her room perfect also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to look as it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter set for my new queen bed unfortunately the comforter is a bit small for a queen, in the picture they show it sprawling over the edges and onto the floor this blanket barely covers the mattress itself as seen in the pictures I would recommend buying this comforter it seems well-constructed and it seems that it would be warm in the winter months but I would suggest getting a size bigger than what your bed is
customer_reviews.author: 2 midgets 69ing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality not great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality not great, but for the price it's right on point. Any reviewer who dinged this set due to poor quality was either expecting too much for $100 or decided to throw it in the washer then complain about the comforter.. I knew in advance that comforters should be dry cleaned, but the tag with Dry Clean only was kind of a dead give away...just sayin'. If your expecting some super high end set then you will be disappointed because this isn't it, but if you have realistic expectations of what you'll receive for a C note you'll be satisfied.t-you get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.author: cmariedb

customer_reviews.title: Picture does not match actual product
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this product today, way passed the deadline of return. This is not what I intended on ordering at all, it is not gray at all. It is hunter green. It matches absolutely nothing in the bedroom I bought it for. I wasted $80 on something that I now have no use for because it is not the colors it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Joetta

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t catch on
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about 5 comforter/duvet sets. I have immediate favorites and change them out often. This one never fit into the rotation do I sent it to a friend who three months later sent it back to me unopened so I mailed it to it’s third home where I hope it will remain. Nothing to indicate any quality flaws, just color combinations are not attracting. The reverse pattern seems better. Including 4 main colors in a room which already has three main colors is just too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Item does not reflect image
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son's new house. It was a very good price and comes with the decorative pillows and sheet set, but the actual product looks VERY different from the picture. The gray shade is very, very,. VERY light and takes up the majority of the fabric. There is minimal black in the design. It would be more appropriate for a college dorm room or teen bedroom. Unfortunately, by the time we unpacked everything and had it set up, the return window had closed. We were looking for something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the red, white, and navy one for my son's room. Very nice! I like that all the throw pillows were included - great price! He really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bed in a Bag
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for the guestroom. It had everything we needed in it, and the comforter and the sheets, to the decorative pillows. No more having to try and piece multiple sets together or by a shopping cart full of miscellaneous accessories. The sheets are incredibly soft, and the comforter is heavy duty. The decorative pillows provide a great accent, and make a decent support for laying on my top of the sheets. Overall great quality, better than we expected for the price. We have used it for our guest room, And so far all of our guests I found them credibly comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best I could ask for especially for the price! It is supersoft and comfortable. If anything negative at all is the shams are very much like the pillow cases but really if thats the worst I can say. I absolutely love it even the sheets, I feared would be low quality, are soft and great match I ordered another sheet set along with it which I am returning. As for the negative posts about falling apart in the wash First they should probably have read where it says "Dry Clean preferred" however I ran mine thru the gentle cycle and low tumble and not a thing wrong with it! Hope you love yours as much as I do mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price was reasonable but wasn’t fully pleased with the comforter
customer_reviews.text: Price was reasonable but wasn’t fully pleased with the comforter. I figured with the “original price” of 200+ the comforter would be a little more heavy duty and not so thin. Over all though it’s a great looking product and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess the set is ok.. but honestly, the comforter barely covers our bed, but doesn't fully cover the mattress on the sides.. and it's very thin and hardly stuffed, which I don't like heavy blankets anyway, but this set was supposed to be our nice, good looking set, and it looks like blah... Nothing at all like the photo! I do like that it comes with the decorative pillows though.
customer_reviews.author: MissHollie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nothing like pictures/cheap horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the other negative reviews but gave this a chance because of the price! Big mistake! The color wasn’t even close to what the depict in the add! The entire set looks sun bleached instead of a deep vibrant color! Quality wise this set is cheap as can be like something made by a middle school kid in sewing class! Total waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Ian Jex

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My first bedding purchase from Amazon and last. It is very cheaply made, stains on the comforter, the sheet is too long, and the sides are too short. I bought a better quality one at walmart for less, and I still have that set, I wont return this item, its too difficult to package back up and seal, gave it to my neighbors
customer_reviews.author: Ron Silberberg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $90
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had cheaper comforters with better quality. It just looks kinda cheap & doesn’t feel the best. Overall, it wouldn’t be bad if it was maybe $50. When paying more you expect more I guess. It came with string all over the place. Pillows are kinda rough looking and the stitching overall wasn’t fantastic. Personally wouldn’t have bought this if I knew what I was going to get, but I already washed it (figured maybe it just needed a clean and fluff, but no).
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bedding set. It is super soft and seems to be great quality for the price. We have a 12 inch king size memory foam mattress and it fits like a glove! I bought it as an extra set for wash day on our regular floral duvet and sheet set. We will use it as our everyday bedding and the floral will be our backup set. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda Phelps

customer_reviews.title: It is decent
customer_reviews.text: Over all this is ok, I like the design. I have a kind size bed and I bought king size set. It fits but barely. The sheets fit fine it's the comforter. It certainly does not fit like it shows in the picture much smaller and it only fits one way. The stitching though out the blanket seems a bit strange. Overall I am happy, bot sure I would of bought if it was not prime day
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: im always buying new comforters i just love nice bed sets..my son not so much he could literally use same one for years ..anyway i got tired of seeeing his same bed set so bought this one ...and it is much nicer in person...i got it while it was on sale... it came with 2 pillowcase, 2 shams, and 3 decor pillows ,and sheets... the material is a cooling feeling which is amazing cuz my son is a hot sleeper....he absolutely loves it ...would recommend ...very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: claudette davis

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed in this comforter. I expected something heavier for the price, and to be honest was REALLY disappointed when I unpackaged it to find how light it is. The pillows feel cheap and for the price, not worth it honestly. I would not recommend this to anyone, although I suppose that is what I get for buying something like this online without being able to see what the quality was.
customer_reviews.author: Eruss261

customer_reviews.title: Looks like pic but cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. It came exactly as shown. However, the quality wasn't as expected for the price. For $75 this is just like "bed in a bag" from Walmart. And had I known that I would have saved myself $30-$40. Still rated 3stars because it is as shown, just really thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the product was posted
customer_reviews.text: I read mixed reviews and the one that I would agree with the most is that it is you get what you pay for. This is in my sons room. It is decent quality (not high end by any means) but was good for a kids room. The bedding was just king size. I have a 13" mattress and it just fit. The colors were good.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but the comfortor is made from very thin material. I am afraid it won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking; not so good quality
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice looking set. Very modern. Colors are what they are supposed to be. The fabric is soft, almost velvet-like. However, after only 5 washes in the last year or so (try not to use the set much) it is starting to become frail. As much as I try, I cannot have the comforter to look smooth and unwrinkled. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Ok product, shipped fast, packaged nicely. However, cheaply made, very poor quality. Order for king bed, sheets fit, comforter did not fits my queen bed. Washed once and started to fall apart. Would not purchase again or recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CBond

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not that great...
customer_reviews.text: I washed and dried the comforter when it was delivered today before putting it on my bed and it is a wrinkled mess! The fabric is bunched and wadded up in the stitching in various places around the comforter, permanently misshaped. I do not think it will ever look smooth like in the advertised picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Green

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, poorly made. Dislike!
customer_reviews.text: 100% synthetic fibers... looks and feels like cheap garbage after you launder it. The stuffing bunches up after laundering. I am very disappointed. You get what you pay for. I don’t expect this set to last long. Don’t buy it. You’re welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Nanstiel

customer_reviews.title: Scam!
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam!! They sent me a 3-piece sherpa comforter set that doesn’t look anything like the picture. I got this as a gift to someone and imagine my surprise when they sent me the picture!! I was so embarrassed. Now, I want an apology and my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: white is really tan on the grey set!
customer_reviews.text: Small for a king comforter , biggest thing is in the picture set looks grey, black and white! But its really grey , black and tan . For that reason zero stars . Totally threw all my deco off. Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Benzo

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 23 year old son, king size bed! He absolutely loves it and talks about how nice the sheets feel. The price to me was fabulous for the quality and the quantity of this beautiful bedding
customer_reviews.author: Tammy T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new comforter set once I got a queen size bed and this did the trick the coloring is nice and vibrant and as a added bonus it comes with the throw pillows .
customer_reviews.author: TMI

customer_reviews.title: Delivered stained
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to go on a new bed I had purchased and was waiting to be delivered and now that it's here and unopened it I found what looks like stains or some kind of manufacturing defect on the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved all colors together. It feels good. I wish it would have been a tad bit thicker. Matched my room very good. The sheets I wished would have fit a larger mattress. It fits a 12 inch mattress. Loved the blue colors with the white and red
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to look like the picture after you set it all up on your bed
customer_reviews.text: Overall Didn't quite look like what I was expecting. In pictures it show hanging over side of mattress but that's not how it is. Also not as fluffy as pic actually pretty flat. Thinner than expected also. I was going to get a cheaper one but decided to spend almost double on this one telling myself I wanted to get the one that was going to look better rather than save some money now I'm wondering if cheaper one would have been same quality as this one. Very misleading picture
customer_reviews.author: Charlie vvv

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Came in defective , thread we’re hanging all over , the comforter has patches of poor stitching ... ended up going to Sams Club . Item has been sent back .
customer_reviews.author: Sam R.

customer_reviews.title: Classy !
customer_reviews.text: Just as pretty in the bag as it is on the bed . Great quality . I bought it for my guest room and everyone loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color way off, but ok for price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a good buy, however the color in the picture doesn’t match at all. It looked like a maroon and we got a very bright red. We’ll keep it, just not what we thought we were getting.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE (BS)
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased this item twice and on each occassion the item sent, LOOKS NOTHING LIKE THE ONE THEY"RE PRESENTING !!! TOTALLY DIFFERNT COMFORTER !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Pillows not sewn well and tore
customer_reviews.text: Pillows were not sewn well and after only a few weeks had holes in the seams. Bedspread is soft, but light so its not for winter.
customer_reviews.author: miss mary

customer_reviews.title: Red dye bleeds a bit...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed linens but the red bled into the white borders a bit. Its a good thing I keep the room very dark so it won't show. Other than that its soft and very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great bed set
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and light weight. Its comfortable but it was a lot thinner the I expected. Its a great bed set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy12

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine for an inexpensive comforter set but don’t expect it to last too long, after washing. My son does love it though.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful. It is a perfect fit, and I loved it very much. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere near as fluffy or big as shown in the picture. Also, it’s not black and grey, it’s black and a weird looking green. I was disappointed when I made my bed and saw what it actually looked like, but it’s okay for the money since they sale the same thing at Macy’s for $139.99
customer_reviews.author: Diego Morales

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when it came so quickly. However, I washed it before I placed it one my bed...and some of the seams came loose, now it is all ruined. I paid too much money for this product to be so poor in quality. I am afraid to return it because I washed it already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Product an quality material, very fair. Best part is the material didnt seem as if it came from a factor floor (No factor or warehouse smell) Big thumbs uP.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V

customer_reviews.title: Too much static
customer_reviews.text: They conduct a massive amount of static electricity! For some reason they make me hot to the point I have to remove them. This sort of thing might work for some of you, but I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Friend

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Picture on ad was nicer than what I received. I anticipated a thicker comforter even at the discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: Smazzle

customer_reviews.title: Love the comforter but not the sheets
customer_reviews.text: The comforter looked just as pictured. It fits the bed nicely and is very soft. The downside was the sheets. They are very thick (almost like a thin blanket). I am saving them for winter, but they are much too hot for Spring. I though that they were standard cotton, but the material is closer to flannel.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Hanavan

customer_reviews.title: Skip this product unless it is under $40
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, I expected the quality of the fabric to be mid-level. It, sadly is not. On a 5 point quality scale I would give it a 2. When putting fitted sheet on the bed, I noticed a small slit in the fabric, right near the pocket seam. Would not purchase again. Would also avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bedding set that looks like it would cost more than I payed!
customer_reviews.author: Donald V. Clos

customer_reviews.title: As listed
customer_reviews.text: Everything comes as listed. No problem with product not the greatest quality but my teen son still loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sims

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft super comfortably I would highly recommend this bed set to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Bigbrad87

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Thinnest 100% polyester material. Even sheets are 100% polyester. Would be extremely hot to sleep on. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: SnowsSteve

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS HIGH END AS PIC SUGGESTS
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. SPEND 30 MORE AND GET A BETTER PRODUCT. LOOKS CHEAP
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Product quality and delivery time.
customer_reviews.text: It was very well packed up, and is going to be very comfortable and warm. I am going to use it for my new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits perfect in my bed but sadly for some reason it has a bad smell to it I washed the sheets and the comforter and the pillowcases but it still smells very bad I don’t know what is made out of. Has anyone has the same problem?
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Vega

customer_reviews.title: thin material
customer_reviews.text: very thin material, color not shown, well not last three pices missing
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to tuck
customer_reviews.text: The bedding is a little bigger so you can easily tuck all sides in. Plus it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my father in law, he really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Craven

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sheets for my bedroom with my girlfriend. She approves. They're very soft, and washable. They gold heat very well and the fabric is nice.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful nice set ! Comfortable and soft just right fit and color !!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had this set for a few months now and it has held up really well. Super comfortable and fast shippimg.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bed set is so comfortable and I love it! The price is great and the quality is even better! I’ve had it for a few months now and I’ve washed it many times, and it is still perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, high quality comforter set!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this comforter set. It's very attractive, sturdy, and well made. It's also a much better deal than I saw for the exact same comforter from a major retailer!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri H.

customer_reviews.title: READ REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of not reading the reviews. Anyways it's mostly gray and the accent lining is at the head of the blanket which will be covered by pillows anyways. You're better off buying a cheaper blanket and still get the same cheap quality. In conclusion, it looks different in person and the quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone. The sheets and pillowcases are ok. I was drinking a cup of water and it fell on the comforter. It matted together in that spot. I spent to much money for not to be able to let water touch it. I wish I would've open when I purchased now I'm outside the return window. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D Spann

customer_reviews.title: Great bedding set
customer_reviews.text: The mattress I have is deep and the fitted sheet does not fix well. The comfort of the rest is great.
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made and not worth the value I paid for this set, most cheap looking comforter set I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: The material... the moment it needs washing another one would need to be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This tore to pieces after a month. The seams all ripped apart. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Brian Perkins

customer_reviews.title: The set looks very nice. However
customer_reviews.text: The set looks very nice. However, upon receiving it i washed it and all the fluff on the inside of the comforter balled up and it looks terrible now. I managed to drag it somewhat back to where its supposed to go but you can still feel and see the lumps.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: MY BED!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This comforter set is so soft and we just love it! Will be getting another one Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Marvette Townsend

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very comfortable. Sheets are very soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this bedset!! True to size and very comfortable. Sheets are very soft. Pillows are great! Great colors! Goes perfect in my sons room!
customer_reviews.author: KJPJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very soft. Sheets are a nice dark grey that come with it. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The colors are nice but quality just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's what my son picked. The colors are nice but quality just okay, a bit flimsy and stitching off in places.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: No bedskirt and it does not hang low enough
customer_reviews.text: The cover might fit a Cal King better, but it does not hang low enough to cover the mattress on a King, and there is no bed skirt, so the bed frame shows.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the A!
customer_reviews.text: Like the color feature; however, will need to be careful with washing. Material of product not as heavy as expected. However you get what you pay for. Was wondering, why so cheap
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not true colors
customer_reviews.text: Photos looked grey/black, but when I opened the bag it's more of an olive green/black. disappointed in the coloring, doesn't match my room at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...I don't know.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket was soft. The gray color isn't as rich as it is in the photo. I washed it before I used it, cold and tumble dry low like they said, but the material inside the comforter warped or something. And it stuck together. I had to tug on the comforter like 5 or 10 minutes for it to even cover the bed from being so warped....
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Very horrible product. I washed the blanket when I received it and all the cotton went to the bottom of the blanket basically detached and now it's like I'm sleeping with a sheet. I spent almost $80 for nothing. Very upset 😡
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not the color as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find the color that I received is more of a hunter green. Advertising shows a very dark black and grey. Also when I came back on the website I noticed the price fluctuated, it’s now almost 40 bucks less than what I paid, this was just like 4 days ago. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Legnon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. The Grey is not as dark as in the picture, I wish it was darker. I have washed it serval times now and it still looks like it did when I bought it. Other than the Grey looking a little washed out I am very happy with it. If the color was on point I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bed set ever
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely perfect my fiance is going to love it I hope he will lol
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Threads loose after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Immediately washed/dried it per the tag on each item (minus the pillows). The comforters threads came loose as well as the top sheet. Demanding a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The red is actually WAY brighter. I liked it because the picture showed a maroon shade. This is like bright lipstick red. Its pretty comfortable but the fabric bunches together and tears easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cozy. I bought different sheets because I wanted a different color, but the ones that come with this set are soft and seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the money and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comphy. I love this bedding. The comforter is nice and fluffy but still breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey McGerr

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: cheapest bed set I've ever purchased. The seams are already falling apart. Haven't even washed it yet. Absolutely depressing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly green

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It's a comforter set, colors are nice and it's comfortable. Many pillows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed bath and beyond will get my next purchase for a bedding upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Cheap I would have spent the extra money. It's not burgandy like I thought, its red. I feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: rodriguez lewis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It always looks better in the pictures but this really lives up to what it looks like. Now my room is beyond comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Paszter

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Great product for its great price! Used in my 17yr old sons room.
customer_reviews.author: Misti cole

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin
customer_reviews.text: I paid a lot for this because I didn'want to get something cheap and thin. Cheap and thin is exactly what I got. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: christina garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I followed the wash instructions and the blanket melted in the dryer on low. I guess other people have had this same problem too.. It seems like this seller doesn't really contact their customers so this sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Aneesa

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: They look just how they are described and are very comfy. If only it came with a bed skirt, then it would have been 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: adrian carel

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price point
customer_reviews.text: This is a good comforter for the price. It definitely Isn’t as luxurious or fluffy as the picture shows. I wish it were a little heavier and better quality but overall it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Diane Holt

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. Soft lightweight and cool. Would look great in a guest room but is also well made enough to be used every day. Fits my memory foam mattress perfectly and doesn't get pulled up!
customer_reviews.author: Alex J. Arnet

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The fabric has a weird feel to it. I can’t explain it. It looks great though
customer_reviews.author: Legal Assistant

customer_reviews.title: Not the true color
customer_reviews.text: The picture made it look like more of a deep dark red and charcoal, not the true bright red and black that it was. It was a bit on the thin side, but for the price it wasn't terrible. I just wasn't happy with the color of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Tidd

product_meta.title: Chic Home Zarah 10 Piece Comforter Bedding with Sheet Set and Decorative Pillows Shams, Queen, Grey
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:GreyChic Home Zarah Grey 10 Pieced Banded Comforter Set
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported

SUPER SOFT LUXURIOUS MICROFIBER – The Chic Home Zarah oversized comforter is made with premium quality durable engineered microfiber cotton feel fabric – No more rustling and crinkling as you toss and turn to get comfortable. Just quiet peaceful sleep with an amazingly soft comforter cover.

The Zarah queen size patchwork comforter is stuffed with 100% hypoallergenic synthetic filling – Perfect for anyone with allergies looking to breathe and sleep easy, especially children and the elderly

STYLE AND COMFORT ALL YEAR ROUND – Be comfortable all year round with the Zarah striped comforter queen by Chic Home – Stuffed with lightweight synthetic down alternative filling the comforter will keep you warm in the winter and cool in the summer

CONTEMPORARY PIECED PATTERNED DESIGN – Achieve the elegant sophisticated style you are looking for with the Chic Home Zarah minimalist comforter set – The simple yet elegant piecing and banding color blocking technique adds a 3D effect that is guaranteed to elevate your master suite or guest room

A BED SET BUILT TO LAST – The Chic Home Zarah patterned queen comforter set is made with strict quality control standards and comes with everything you need for a bedding makeover. With a Queen size comforter, sheet set, decorative pillows and shams, this set is all you need to transform your décor and elevate your style. Add one to cart today and turn your bedroom into a Chic Home.
